text: The Temple of Heaven (Chinese: 天坛) is a temple and famous attraction in Beijing, China. The Temple of Heaven was built in 1420 c.e. Emperors in the Ming Dynasty and Qing Dynasty went there to pray. In 1918, the Temple of Heaven complex was made a public park. It is 270 hectares in size. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Beijing Category:Temples in Asia Category:2nd millennium BC buildings and structures
title: Temple of Heaven
